title: Turnout in Pres Elections- Russia Iran

content.question: Respond to all parts of the question: (a) Using the data in the graph, describe a pattern in the data for Russia between 2000 and 2018. Explain a possible reason for this pattern in Russia. (b) Using the data in the graph and your knowledge of AP Comparative Government and Politics, draw a conclusion about authoritarianism in Russia between 2000 and 2018. (c) Explain why voter turnout for presidential elections in Russia differs from voter turnout for presidential elections in Iran.

frqParts.text: Respond to all parts of the question: (a) Using the data in the graph, describe a pattern in the data for Russia between 2000 and 2018. Explain a possible reason for this pattern in Russia. (b) Using the data in the graph and your knowledge of AP Comparative Government and Politics, draw a conclusion about authoritarianism in Russia between 2000 and 2018. (c) Explain why voter turnout for presidential elections in Russia differs from voter turnout for presidential elections in Iran.

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Describe patterns and trends in data.
